scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul report --root ./coverage --dir ./coverage lcov
scripts.coveralls: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul report --root ./coverage --dir ./coverage lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
